items.title: Need to predict the future?

objectives_summary: Goal: Improve sales forecast accuracy, resulting in higher sales (fewer stock-outs) and lower inventory holding costs (better inventory turnover)
Objective 1: Apply exponential smoothing to your sales data
Objective 2: Test various forecasting methods and settings to find the best combination

items.title: Presentation Fundamentals as an Analytics Professional

visible_instructors.job_title: Director of Product, Analytics Instructor and Course Creator
visible_instructors.name: Chris
visible_instructors.title: Chris Hui

items.headline: Presenting as a Data Driven Professional
objectives_summary: In this Course, you'll learn about the fundamentals of presentations as a Analytics Professional. Want to learn how to present to Executives with impact so your analyses actually get adopted? Look no no further.

Specifically, you'll cover Executive, Technical and Non Technical Presentations where you'll learn exactly why these presentation styles are so prevalent and how to effectively structure your insights to get acted on each and every time with custom examples walking you through each presentation style.

Additionally you'll learn the critical building blocks composed of Headlines, Graphical Alignment and Sequential Themes that help any Analytics presentation stand out from the crowd with a relentless focus on Underlying Value.

items.title: Business Forecasting with Google Sheets
items.headline: Increase your income and career prospects with business forecasting skills
objectives_summary: Make decisions based on business data
You will learn how to use Google Sheets
You will understand how and why to smooth data and pick the best approach to apply

Support your personalised curriculum of the learning journey by a better understanding the connected terminology between multiple subjects.
